content: **knitted scarf in drops melody the piece is worked back and forth with english rib and stripes ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ml-100 yarn group d ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width approx 26 cm length approx 159 cm **yarn** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 50 g colour 01 off white 50 g colour 03 pearl grey 50 g colour 15 beige **needles** drops single pointed needles size 6 mm **knitting gauge** 12 stitches in width and 26 row in height with english rib = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
